Posted By: WhiteWizard42 (7/6/2011 5:50:36 PM)

posts.post_content:
Wow!? So, I can spend FIVE mana to deal 4 damage to a creature (provided it is not an elemental), instead of spending 1 mana to deal 3 damage to any creature or player with a Lightning Bolt?! But, this will deal 7 damage to Treefolk - which are, as we know, VERY scary, so it must be good?!
  
   
Seriously?! WHY!!
  
   
Oh, and it is a Sorcery, too. Nice.

Seriously?! WHY!!

Oh, and it is a Sorcery, too. Nice.

posts.post_content:
I think the deal is that in an elemental deck this spell can be cast by spending elemental mana, which is abundant [smokebraiders](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=smokebraiders) and all that jazz.  
I'd still pick [flameslash](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=flameslash), even if it's a sorcery. I mean, how often are you just letting 5 mana stay unspendt between rounds just in case there's something you reallyreallyreally want to kill coming out with haste?
posts.html:

posts.post_content: Horrid card. I mean sure, in a draft you would have begrudgingly accepted it as a final pick. Heck, you may have even used it to magnificent effect that one time. Outside of the draft however. Almost waste of cardboard. 1.5/5 because unlike [some](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=202555) [cards](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=5584) it may have caused some major upsets once upon a time.

Posted By: TheManakinTransfer (6/14/2012 11:26:47 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
would have been just fine if it could have dealt
  
4 to non-elementals
  
FIVE TO PLAYERS
  
and 6 to treefolk
  
   
then it would have been 'Super Lava Axe', and yet not really all that pushed.
  
probably would have forced it into uncommon. in order for Sorcery speed burn
  
to be worth using, it really has to be able to hit players. Flame Slash was pushed
  
as far as we'll ever see, and it's still only 'ok/fine', not 'super great', because not only Bolt
  
but even Shock are so efficient that things are not instants AND miss either creatures or players
  
are just really hard to make desirable.

but even Shock are so efficient that things are not instants AND miss either creatures or players
are just really hard to make desirable.
